A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First time posting on Rotten Tomatoes.  I wanted to join the throngs saying that The Last Jedi was a bore.  I really didn't care about the plot.  Kylo Ren confuses me and the action was snooze-worthy.  Daisy Ridley's acting kept me awake\, thank goodness.  My daughter liked the little penguin things.
